message: Let's be fair and split close to 50/50, but considering the inflation. This offer is time-sensitive!
I understand the inflation puts pressure on you, but your initial offer wasn't fair to me. Let's split it evenly.
Bob, time is literally money for me in this game.  I'm making another fair offer, but this has to be settled soon.
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable, but I also need a deal that makes sense for me. This offer recognizes the time pressure you're under.
